How to Set Up Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)

Here are the instructions to set up 2FA for your Ndax account.

Before setting up 2FA for Ndax, make sure to download an authenticator app on your mobile device.

Google 2FA app, Microsoft 2FA app and Authy are popular 2FA apps that you can download and use for free.

  1. Navigate to account settings > Two-Factor Authentication
  2. Scan the QR image using your 2FA app, or copy the secret key and paste it in the 2FA authenticator app
  3. The 2FA app will now be connected to your Ndax account
  4. The 2FA app will now generate a 6-digit code which refreshes every 30 seconds
  5. Copy & paste this 6-digit code from the 2FA authenticator into Ndax where it says 'Enter generated code into the input field below'
  6. Click 'Enable'

Congratulations, the 2FA should be successfully set up with your Ndax account now. You will need to enter the 6-digit code from the 2FA app every time you log in or make any withdrawals.
